author: pgollucci
msg: Add note about testing sudo and not annoying root@

author: henning
msg: Run the test cases relative to the base dir of Velocity. This makes the test work under Windows again (Tested with XP, ant 1.6.5, JDK 1.5.0_05). Factor out the ".." and "." directories into velocity.dir and velocity.build.dir, use relative pathes in both build.xml and testcases.xml.
